sentences.sContent: The long cloak she was wearing enveloped her completely.
sentences.sCn: 她穿着的斗篷把她全包裹起来了。

sentences.sContent: Today most of New England will be under a cloak of thick mist.
sentences.sCn: 今天新英格兰大部分地区会在浓雾的笼罩中。

trans.tranOther: a warm piece of clothing like a coat without sleeves that hangs loosely from your shoulders
